name: ANAND SOMASEKHARAN
my_business:
We specialize in financial accounting and offer a comprehensive suite of services tailored for businesses of all sizes. At Denovo, we assist startups with hassle-free business formation and compliance, provide monthly retainer services covering accounting, GST, and income tax filings, and support businesses with assessments, litigation, and financial structuring. Our expertise ensures that businesses stay compliant, financially healthy, and ready for growth without worrying about regulatory hurdles.
If you are a startup looking for proper financial guidance or an established business in need of structured accounting and tax solutions, let’s connect and work towards building a strong financial foundation for your business.
top_product: Outsourced Retainer Monthly Accounting Services including but not limited to GST, Income Tax, Payroll Services, Start up Services, Financial Management
ideal_referral: 1. Business Owners & Startups -Entrepreneurs & startups needing company incorporation and financial structuring. -SMEs looking for outsourced accounting and tax compliance services. -Businesses seeking assistance with GST, Income Tax, and corporate tax filings. -Companies requiring financial advisory, budgeting, and cost control strategies. 2. High-Net-Worth Individuals (HNWIs) & Professionals -Individuals needing tax planning, investment structuring, or wealth management advisory. -NRIs seeking guidance on taxation, remittances, or compliance with Indian tax laws. -Doctors, consultants, and freelancers who require efficient tax planning. 3. Corporate & Institutional Clients -Companies needing statutory audits, internal audits, or forensic accounting services. -Businesses requiring assistance in fundraising, loan applications, or financial projections. -Import-export firms needing GST & international taxation compliance. -Companies seeking payroll processing, ESI, PF, and labor law compliance. 4. Legal & Business Consultants -Lawyers and corporate advisors who work with businesses on financial compliance matters. -Real estate developers & investors needing taxation and financial due diligence. 5. Industry-Specific Referrals -Retail & wholesale businesses needing bookkeeping, GST compliance, and financial reporting. -Manufacturers requiring cost analysis, inventory management, and tax structuring. -Hospitality, healthcare, and IT companies looking for financial and tax planning solutions.
top_problem_solved: Inventory Management issues of a large Hyper Market Chain Internal Financial Management and MIS issues of a Branded Retail Footwear Business
my_favourite_bni_story: All stories are favorite but the best is yet to come!!!!!

With an experience of 5 years, I have started a new franchise for Solar energy called JIBIN SOLAR ENERGY PVT. LTD, at the heart of Perumbavoor town. We are now one of the top sellers and dealers of Solar Energy solutions all over Kerala. We are also and authorized vendor of MNRE subsidy program of the Prime Minister of India.

name: SUNIL CHANDRAN
top_product: At DCOMPASS, our top product is our customized global tours, meticulously designed to provide unforgettable travel experiences tailored to our clients' unique preferences and interests. Whether it's exploring iconic landmarks, immersing in local cultures, or indulging in adventure activities, our personalized approach ensures every journey is memorable and meaningful. Key Features: Tailored Itineraries: Expertly crafted to meet specific client expectations, ensuring a perfect balance of sightseeing, relaxation, and cultural immersion. Local Expertise: Leveraging extensive destination knowledge and partnerships with trusted local guides to offer authentic experiences. Flexibility and Personalization: Ability to customize tours based on individual or group preferences, from luxury accommodations to off-the-beaten-path adventures. Client Benefits: Exceptional Service: Dedicated support from initial consultation to post-trip follow-up, ensuring a seamless and stress-free travel experience. Memorable Experiences: Creating lifelong memories through unique activities and exclusive access to hidden gems in every destination. Peace of Mind: Comprehensive logistics management and 24/7 assistance to handle any unforeseen circumstances, allowing clients to relax and enjoy their journey. Why Choose Us: Expertise and Reliability: Years of experience in the travel industry, delivering excellence in every aspect of tour management. Customer Satisfaction: Proven track record of exceeding client expectations, reflected in glowing testimonials and repeat business. Commitment to Quality: Emphasizing quality over quantity, ensuring each tour maintains our high standards of service and authenticity.
ideal_referral: Individuals or groups planning international tours seeking expert guidance and personalized experiences. Companies organizing corporate retreats, incentive trips, or team-building activities abroad. Event planners arranging destination weddings or special celebrations in unique global locations.
top_problem_solved: At DCOMPASS, we specialize in solving the challenge of managing complex travel logistics, ensuring seamless experiences for our clients. One significant example involves organizing a diverse itinerary for a group of professionals attending an international conference from multiple cities. Challenges Faced: Coordination: Coordinating flights, accommodations, and ground transportation from several cities with varying logistical demands. Individual Preferences: Addressing diverse preferences and scheduling constraints of attendees while maintaining a cohesive itinerary. Our Solution: Customized Itinerary Planning: Designed a tailored itinerary that optimized travel routes and schedules, balancing business obligations with leisure opportunities. Logistics Expertise: Leveraged our extensive network of global partners to secure reliable and cost-effective transportation and accommodations. Results Achieved: Efficiency and Seamlessness: Streamlined travel arrangements minimized travel disruptions and enhanced overall trip efficiency. Client Satisfaction: Received positive feedback from attendees for the smooth organization and personalized service throughout the conference. Continued Partnership: Strengthened our relationship with the client, leading to ongoing collaboration on future events and travel programs. Why It Matters: Expertise in Complex Logistics: Demonstrates our capability to handle intricate travel requirements with precision and expertise. Client-Centric Approach: Highlights our commitment to delivering tailored solutions that meet client objectives and exceed expectations. Reliability and Trust: Positions DCOMPASS as a trusted partner for organizations seeking dependable travel management solutions.
my_favourite_bni_story: One of my favorite experiences in BNI involves a collaboration that led to significant business growth and strengthened professional relationships. Through regular networking and building trust within the group, I connected with many fellow members who was seeking comprehensive travel solutions for them. Key Points: Mutual Trust and Referrals: By consistently attending meetings and actively participating in BNI activities, I established trust and credibility among members. This resulted in receiving referrals and recommendations for our specialized services. Successful Partnership: One particular referral led to a successful collaboration with a growing company needing tailored travel management solutions. We were able to meet their specific needs, resulting in a long-term partnership and continued business opportunities. Networking Benefits: BNI not only provided a platform to showcase our expertise but also facilitated connections with professionals across various industries, expanding our client base and enhancing our reputation in the market. Impact and Growth: Business Expansion: The referral from BNI not only contributed to our revenue growth but also allowed us to diversify our client portfolio and strengthen our position in the travel management industry. Community and Support: Beyond business, BNI has been instrumental in fostering a supportive community of like-minded professionals who are committed to each other’s success. Why It Matters: Personal Fulfillment: This story reflects the rewarding relationships and business successes that BNI has enabled me to achieve. Gratitude and Commitment: I am grateful for the opportunities BNI continues to provide and remain committed to contributing positively to the success of fellow members.
